text: Jerry Wayne Hairston, Jr. (born May 29, 1976) was a Major League Baseball infielder and outfielder for nine different teams. He played for the Baltimore Orioles, Chicago Cubs, Texas Rangers, Cincinnati Reds, New York Yankees, San Diego Padres, Washington Nationals, Milwaukee Brewers, and Los Angeles Dodgers. title: Jerry Hairston Jr.
